content: ***you can find this pattern for free on my blog or you can purchase an ad-free printable pdf version including a text only version *** the extra cozy trapper hat is extra thick and warm with a fuzzy lining at the bottom this pattern shows you how to make it two different sizes s/m and l this hat is made with worsted weight yarn you won t need 2 skeins worth of yarn but i recommend using 2 skeins just to make it easier if your skein has a center pull you can use both ends of the same skein but it s more likely to get twisted you will also need a size j 6 0mm crochet hook and a tapestry needle you ll need a small button to fasten the straps and can use optional large buttons for the front flap instructions for the button and non-button versions are included so you can pick whichever you prefer ***you re welcome to do whatever you d like to with finished products made from this pattern but if you do sell them i ask that you link back to my page you may not copy this pattern repost it anywhere either altered or in its original form or claim it as your own you may not use any photos on this site for your own use ***
